message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CC, cs.SD

This paper discusses language acquisition and learning from positive evidence, which falls under the category of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also discusses formal results and the use of simplicity as a framework for language acquisition, which suggests a connection to machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also mentions the ability to scale-down the simplicity approach to analyze specific linguistic constructions, which could fall under the category of compiler construction (cs.CC) or software engineering (cs.SD).
